ex: Excursions according to the tour program
air: Comfortable air-conditioned transport for the whole route
ent: Entrance tickets for the mentioned monuments
fee: Fees for photo and video shooting on monuments
loc: Local guides in the cities during the tour
ras: Accommodation in comfortable hotels in double rooms
sale: Get a 10% discount on your next trip
hotel: Hotels of our sunny Uzbekistan with which we cooperate
meets: All meetings and farewells at the airport
citiesOf: All historic cities of sunny Uzbekistan
morePeople: If you want a group tour then write to us and we will find a suitable tour for you at a low price
